statement.tex: %text What will \[ (f\circ g)(7)\] be if \[ \quad f(x) = x+7 \text{ and } g(x) = x - 7, x\in\mathbb{R} \] %

reason.tex:
%text $(f\circ g)(x)$ is \underline\text{simply short-hand} for $f\left[ g(x) \right]$.
Also, \[ (f\circ g)(x) \neq f(x)\cdot g(x) \] %

options.tex: %text When $f(x) = x+7$ and $g(x) = x-7$, then \[ (f\circ g)(x) = x \implies (f\circ g)(7) = 7 \] %
